DOC.brief_summary: Several case report showed that the co-infection of Mycoplasma pneumoniae in patients with pulmonary tuberculosis. The aim of this study is to elucidate the prevalence and its clinical significance of co-infection of Mycoplasma pneumonia in patients with newly diagnosed pulmonary tuberculosis.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence and Clinical Significance of Co-infection of Mycoplasma Pneumoniae in Patients With Pulmonary Tuberculosis
DOC.criteria: Bacteriologically or clinically diagnosed pulmonary TB Older than 17years HIV positive Immunecompromized
